entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h becoming west 20 near noon. High 7. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with a few rain showers. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming south 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
